title: bronze rank team
body:
Looking for people to  join  on our bronze team of 5 in rank _must  have Skype and skilled in top mid or jungle
IGN : FANTAWOLF      please add me  ..

replies.body:

i main top and jungle IGN MELTIXAFK hit me up

Hey Man, Me and a mate are in the same situation. Just to say we are a bot lane duo and work well together. :D

Summoner Name: Power Mav
Age: 21
Rank: Silver 3
Role: ADC
Champ Pool (for that role): Basically Every ADC. Happy to download anything.

Summoner Name: Calvin
Age: 19
Rank: Bronze 2 (Decayed from Silver 5 due to Family issues)
Role: Support
Champ Pool (for that role): Leona, Nami, Sona, Taric. But is good at everything.

We both have a 1000 plus wins on normals so we have a fair idea what we are doing just haven't been bothered to actually play ranked
I see a bronze team can i joined me main mid lane
By the way I can top decently. My main top champs are mundo, ryze and aatrox
I'm not quite ranked but i am decent at jg. If your interested my in-game name is wujugod. I prefer jg. I've got Skype. The main champions I like to play recently are Warwick, aatrox and volibear
